Artificer: Chosen weapons, light crossbow, 20 bolts, chosen armor, thieves tools, dungeoneer's pack
Bard: Chosen weapon, a dagger, chosen instrument, leather armor, chosen adventuring pack
Cleric: Chosen weapons, chosen armor, a shield, a holy symbol, chosen adventuring pack
Druid: Chosen weapons/weapon and shield, leather armor, a druidic focus (a replacement for material cost of spells), explorer's pack
Fighter: Chosen weapons, chosen armor, chosen adventuring pack
Monk: Chosen weapon, 10 darts, chosen adventuring pack
Paladin: Chosen weapons, chain mail, a holy symbol, chosen adventuring pack
Ranger: Chosen weapons, a longbow, a quiver of 20 arrows, chosen armor, chosen adventuring pack
Rogue: Chosen weapons, two daggers, leather armor, thieves tools, chosen adventuring pack
Sorcerer: Chosen weapon, two daggers, chosen magical item, chosen adventuring pack
Warlock: Chosen weapons, two daggers, leather armor, chosen magical item, chosen adventuring pack
Wizard: Chosen weapon, chosen magical item, a spellbook, chosen adventuring pack
